title: Similar to "Neo Sans Intel" and "Neo Tech Pro"
content:
Hi folks!

I've spent almost 2 and a half weeks to find this font and can't find it (maybe some old font version?). Seems very similar to "Neo Tech Pro" and "Neo Sans Intel" (at least a good mix of them) in some glyphs.

Thanks in advance for help!

| --- | --- |

comments.content: Thanks a lot, Jeo! You made my day! ;)
